name: Egg Tender
description:
Don't let the egg freeze!

Keep the fire burning under the egg to incubate it!
Collect sticks from your environment to keep the flame hot enough to grow the egg.
If the fire isn't hot enough the egg won't grow.
Make sure not to let the fire run out!

Controls
Move - Arrow Keys
Select - Z

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it alive!

Thanks for playing, Hope you enjoyed!
